document_data.mainbody:
ira was a merchant from the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Galoomp was a friendly portly woman with pale skin and brown hair.
Miras merchant tent could be found in the grand market in Athkatlas Center District â€“ Waukeens Promenade in the . The stock included some mundane items, including, weapons, armor, ranged arms and missiles, and several healings and heroism potions. When asked directions, Mira recommended the Copper Coronet to the adventuring ilk.
